mapper.sql: ID, BH, MC, SCBS, NWWBS, TBBS, XGR, XGSJ, FBH
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from DM_XZQH
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into DM_XZQH (ID, BH, MC, SCBS, NWWBS, TBBS, XGR, XGSJ, FBH) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nwwbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into DM_XZQH
ID,
BH,
MC,
SCBS,
NWWBS,
TBBS,
XGR,
XGSJ,
FBH,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update DM_XZQH
BH = #{bh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MC = #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCBS = #{scbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NWWBS = #{nwwbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TBBS = #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XGR = #{xgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XGSJ = #{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
FBH = #{fbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update DM_XZQH set BH = #{bh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MC = #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCBS = #{scbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NWWBS = #{nwwbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TBBS = #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XGR = #{xgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = #{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE}, FBH = #{fbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.mc, c.nums from( SELECT b.mc, b.num, b.mcs, b.mcss, b.nums FROM ( SELECT 'A' mc, 'A' mcss, 1 num, 'a' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'A' mcss, 2 num, 'a' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='a' UNION SELECT 'B' mc, 'B' mcss, 3 num, 'b' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'B' mcss, 4 num, 'b' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='b' UNION SELECT 'C' mc, 'C' mcss, 5 num, 'c' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'C' mcss, 6 num, 'c' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='c' UNION SELECT 'D' mc, 'D' mcss, 7 num, 'd' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'D' mcss, 8 num, 'd' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='d' UNION SELECT 'E' mc, 'E' mcss, 9 num, 'e' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'E' mcss, 10 num, 'e' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='e' UNION SELECT 'F' mc, 'F' mcss, 11 num, 'f' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'F' mcss, 12 num, 'f' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='f' UNION SELECT 'G' mc, 'G' mcss, 13 num, 'g' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'G' mcss, 14 num, 'g' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='g' UNION SELECT 'H' mc, 'H' mcss, 15 num, 'h' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'H' mcss, 16 num, 'h' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='h' UNION SELECT 'J' mc, 'J' mcss, 19 num, 'j' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'J' mcss, 20 num, 'j' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='j' UNION SELECT 'K' mc, 'K' mcss, 21 num, 'k' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'K' mcss, 22 num, 'k' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='k' UNION SELECT 'L' mc, 'L' mcss, 23 num, 'l' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'L' mcss, 24 num, 'l' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='l' UNION SELECT 'M' mc, 'M' mcss, 25 num, 'm' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'M' mcss, 26 num, 'm' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='m' UNION SELECT 'N' mc, 'N' mcss, 27 num, 'n' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'N' mcss, 28 num, 'n' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='n' UNION SELECT 'O' mc, 'O' mcss, 29 num, 'o' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'O' mcss, 30 num, 'o' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='o' UNION SELECT 'P' mc, 'P' mcss, 31 num, 'p' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'P' mcss, 32 num, 'p' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='p' UNION SELECT 'Q' mc, 'Q' mcss, 33 num, 'q' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'Q' mcss, 34 num, 'q' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='q' UNION SELECT 'R' mc, 'R' mcss, 35 num, 'r' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'R' mcss, 36 num, 'r' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='r' UNION SELECT 'S' mc, 'S' mcss, 37 num, 's' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'S' mcss, 38 num, 's' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='s' UNION SELECT 'T' mc, 'T' mcss, 39 num, 't' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'T' mcss, 40 num, 't' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='t' UNION SELECT 'V' mc, 'V' mcss, 43 num, 'v' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'V' mcss, 44 num, 'v' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='v' UNION SELECT 'W' mc, 'W' mcss, 45 num, 'w' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'W' mcss, 46 num, 'w' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='w' UNION SELECT 'X' mc, 'X' mcss, 47 num, 'x' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'X' mcss, 48 num, 'x' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='x' UNION SELECT 'Y' mc, 'Y' mcss, 49 num, 'y' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'Y' mcss, 50 num, 'y' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='y' UNION SELECT 'Z' mc, 'Z' mcss, 51 num, 'z' mcs, 1 nums FROM dual UNION SELECT a.mc, 'Z' mcss, 52 num, 'z' mcs, 2 nums FROM ( SELECT F_TRANS_PINYIN_CAPITAL(substr(MC,0,1)) letter, MC FROM DM_XZQH t WHERE t.SCBS='2' ) a WHERE a.letter='z' ) b WHERE 1=1
and b.MCS like '%'||#{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR b.MC like '%'||#{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR b.MCSS like '%'||#{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
ORDER BY b.NUM ) c
